name: Meetings
text: [§90D-5]  Meetings.  The commission shall meet at least quarterly.  Failure to attend at least seventy-five per cent of called meetings in any calendar year shall result in removal from the commission.  A quorum shall consist of a simple majority of voting members.  All meetings of the commission shall be conducted subject to chapter 92. [L 2002, c 88, pt of §1]
